youMustBeAccountOwnerTitle: You must be an account owner to use this service
onlyAccountOwnersForAuthAgent: Only account owners for the authorised agent can update the agent's details or close the account.
youllNeedToContactAccountOwner: You'll need to contact an account owner and ask them to use the service. Or, you can ask them to change your role to make you an account owner.
toViewTheAccountOwners: to view the account owners for {BUSINESS_NAME}.
